content:
FILE_WRITTEN:config/intake_checklist.schema.json
DIR_STATE:["config/claim_card.schema.json", "config/claim_card.schema.yaml", "config/claim_card_schema.json", "config/intake_checklist.schema.json", "config/intake_checklist.yaml", "config/qa_gates.yaml", "config/search_plan_template_2019_2025.yaml"]
SUMMARY: Updated the intake checklist JSON Schema to require dataset name+DOI/URL for dataset-verification pilot claims and to reject entries that only specify a research area without a concrete claim or question.
